name: Nokia-5110
body:
### Nokia 5110 It is a library for the Nokia 5110 lcd screen on arduino. The only think for this screen was a list of functions. A library is more clean and useful than that list ! ### Support or Contact If you have any questions, ideas, propositions, contact me:
[Mail](mailto:pierreyves.merle@gmail.com)


[Twitter](https://twitter.com/pierreyves258) /!\ Page in work /!\
tagline: Nokia 5110 lcd screen Library for arduino
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
